metadata.Title: CVE-2019-1010275 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: helm Before 2.7.2 is affected by: CWE-295: Improper Certificate Validation.The impact is: Unauthorized clients could connect to the server becauseself-signed client certs were aloowed. The component is: helm (many filesupdated, seehttps://github.com/helm/helm/pull/3152/files/1096813bf9a425e2aa4ac755b6c991b626dfab50).The attack vector is: A malicious client could connect to the server overthe network. The fixed version is: 2.7.2.

criterions.comment: helm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
